mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_CD AS CODE , DEPT_CD ||'('|| DEPT_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_DEPARTMENT ORDER BY DEPT_NM
SELECT PROGRAM_ID AS CODE , PROGRAM_ID ||'('|| PROGRAM_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_PROGRAM WHERE PROGRAM_TYPE = #{programType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY PROGRAM_ID
SELECT TEMPLATE_ID AS CODE , TEMPLATE_ID ||'('|| TEMPLATE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_GRID_TEMPLATE ORDER BY TEMPLATE_ID

SELECT CODE_CATEGORY AS CODE , CODE_CATEGORY ||'('|| CODE_CATEGORY_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_CODE_CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY SORT_NO, CODE_CATEGORY_NM

SELECT GROUP_CD AS CODE , GROUP_CD ||'('|| GROUP_CODE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_GROUP_CODE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY SORT_NO, GROUP_CODE_NM

SELECT B.TABLE_NAME AS CODE , B.TABLE_NAME ||'('|| B.COMMENTS ||')' AS LABEL FROM ALL_OBJECTS A , ALL_TAB_COMMENTS B WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND B.OWNER = A.OWNER AND B.TABLE_NAME = A.OBJECT_NAME AND B.OWNER = 'MOM_MASTER' ORDER BY LABEL
SELECT OPERATION_ID AS CODE , OPERATION_ID ||'('|| OPERATION_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_OPERATION ORDER BY OPERATION_NM
